name: Music Thing
description:
Music Thing is a configurable, audio-driven, generative landscape inspired by Panoramical.

It was a fun little project to make, I plan on adding more "levels" over time and if people like it I'll release it for about a buck (or just leave it free). I hope you enjoy it, let me know if there is anything you'd want changed/added.

Possible Features I might add:

  • More levels.. possibly with "gameplay" of some kind.
  • Start/Stop recording the audio, so you can make your own music with it.
  • Record your own gifs... to.. I dunno.. look at them :)

Controls

There are 6 music channels each with a volume slider and an instrument slider, manipulating these will change the music and the world will react in interesting ways.
